user_instruction: 'Send Ethan the details for the book cover design (ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com). You can check out my Notion for information.'

          "id": "1f30dc8f-a0db-8175-a834-f05c77d43adf",
          "type": "paragraph",
          "created_time": "2025-05-14T07:45:00.000Z",
          "last_edited_time": "2025-05-14T07:45:00.000Z",
          "has_children": false,
          "text": "The book cover for 'Whispers of the Past' should evoke a sense of mystery and nostalgia. The main elements to include are an old, ornate key and a faded letter.           "last_edited_time": "2025-05-14T07:45:00.000Z",
          "has_children": false,
          "text": "While the plot of 'Whispers of the Past' is somewhat clichéd with predictable twists, and the characters lack depth, the setting descriptions are vivid and could be visually compelling for the cover design."

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com"],"subject":"Details for the Book Cover Design","body":"Hi Ethan,

Here are the details for the book cover design:

Title: Whispers of the Past

Design Brief:
- The book cover should evoke a sense of mystery and nostalgia.
- Main elements to include: an old, ornate key and a faded letter.
- Color scheme: muted earth tones.

Feel free to refer to the synopsis and author bio for deeper context on the themes of the story.

Let me know if anything else is required.

Best regards,
[Your Name]"}

formatted_items.content: The details for the book cover design have been sent to Ethan at ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com. Let me know if there's anything else you'd like me to do!
